<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Block Cabochon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2994)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You take damage from a physical attack while you don't have the affixed shield raised

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clear quartz cabochon attaches to the center of your shield. When you activate the cabochon, use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction even if you don't have the shield raised and even if you don't normally have that reaction. Increase the shield's Hardness by 5 against the triggering attack. The shield remains raised after the block.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Swift Block Cabochon
